headline: FICO UK Credit Card Market Report: June 2025
summary: LONDON, August 14, 2025--The latest credit card market data from global analytics software leader FICO shows how rising spend and falling payments to balance are continuing to push up average balances. Increased spending follows expected seasonal trends, but the percentage of balance paid continues to trend downwards, which will be a concern for lenders.
